unit.class: public interface XSMultiValueFacet extends XSObject { /** * The name of the facet, i.e. FACET_ENUMERATION and * FACET_PATTERN (see XSSimpleTypeDefinition). */ public short getFacetKind (); /** * Values of this facet. */ public StringList getLexicalFacetValues (); /** * A set of [annotations] if it exists, otherwise an empty * XSObjectList. */ public XSObjectList getAnnotations (); }
